if(2==this.type){let t=25;beginShape(),strokeJoin(ROUND);for(let s=-t/2;s<t/2;s++)for(let e=0;e<2;e++)vertex(this.xpos+2+s*(this.size/t-.5),this.ypos+15*noise(s/this.noiseScale+t/this.noiseScale,theta/this.speed+this.offsetV)),vertex(this.xpos+2+s*(this.size/t-.5),this.ypos-15*noise(s/this.noiseScale+t/this.noiseScale,theta/this.speed+this.offsetV));endShape()}else if(3==this.type){let t=20;strokeJoin(ROUND);for(let s=-t/2;s<t/2;s++){beginShape();for(let t=12.5;strokeCap(PROJECT),noFill(),push(),translate(this.xpos,this.ypos+t/9),rotate(radians(-45)),beginShape(),vertex(-t/2,-t/2),vertex(-t/2,t/2),vertex(t/2,t/2),endShape();for(let s=0;s<2;s++)arc(s*t-t/2*s,t/2*s-t/2,t,t,PI+s*HALF_PI,s*HALF_PI);pop()}}}class Circle{constructor(t,s){this.x=t,this.y=s,this.r=50,this.growing=!0}}
